main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed over Savannah, Georgia, between 0415 and 0500 EDT on 28 June 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as round and bright in color,The object exhibited erratic movements in both vertical and horizontal directions,It was observed for approximately 45 minutes before disappearing towards the northeast,The sighting occurred near Chatham Air Force Base,No balloons were reported released by local weather offices during the sighting period.
witness description: Witnessed by an Air Force Lieutenant Colonel and his wife.
